divs: sighting detailsi was in a popular commercial area here in bogota when i notice many people looking at the sky ,so i see three spheres in the sky first they were immobile for about ten minutes then they began to move but at the exact distant one from each other later they form a triangle formation a guy took a camera whit a high range lens to zoom but informed that the only visible feature was a reddish color but still son bright to identify hopefully is video evidence in local news i wonder why this events are no reported i know what i see and i am truthfully the event was observed for about 200 people regards fernando here are the links http:\\www.youtube.com\watch?v=gxuzavf4rga http:\\www.youtube.com\watch?v=gwe_ur77kdi&feature=related
